DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if sildenafil (Viagra) improves exercise tolerance.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Sildenafil in Patient With Heart Failure.
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will undergo an exercise stress test. One dose of Sildenafil will then be given, followed by a one hour rest period. A repeat exercise stress test will then be repeated.
DOC.criteria: Age 18 75 Ejection fraction <35% Heart failure limited by fatigue and shortness of breath Inability to exercise. Patients with shortness of breath while resting. Patient requiring intravenous medication. Patients taking the following medications: nitroglycerine pill/patch/paste, isordil and Imdur
